extendedInfo.description: Fight for resources and conquer the universe in this thrilling Sci-Fi Strategy game, Galactic Heroes!â Real-time battle for survival between the Federation of Empires and the Liberty Alliance âExperience the race for survival between the Federation of Empires and the Liberty Alliance as they clash to gain control over rare and essential minerals throughout the Universe.â Recruit and train legendary heroes âNumerous heroes, each with their own potentials and special skills are in search of a leader who can lead them with charisma and vision. Identify and develop the potentials of the legendary heroes and conquer the Universe.â Build your very own fleet and use it to create the ultimate strategy âMix and match from numerous types of battle ships, weapons, and special devices to build your very own fleet. Then organize your fleet effectively to create the ultimate and undefeatable strategy.â Build a powerful nation that will rule the vast universe âWith the help of the heroes, construct buildings and conquer planets to expand your empire. Conduct research to develop the new technologies to aid you in building the most powerful nation!â Experience the Science Fiction universe through enhanced graphics âThis game was created specifically for the one who will ultimately conquer and rule the universe, YOU! reviews.title: more events
reviews.comment: it started great but its getting repetitive.. :(  please include maybe a clan option.. you can look at battlestations game on facebook, id switch to that game in a heartbeat if it was available here..  also, please include option to remove overrated \'completed\' screens, they take like 3 seconds to go away and the light hurts my eyes.. thank you.. also please allow rearranging placement of my fleets for a specific  fleet formation
reviews.author: Paul Edward Alvarez

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Best graphics and mechanics of all of the RTS games ive ever played. Seriously, rediculously good comparatively
reviews.author: logan milliken

reviews.title: Good game but with pay-to-win features
reviews.comment: I have had some fun with Galactic Heroes, however don\'t expect a great deal of teamwork as it is very much a solo experience. If you have some spare downtime it can be a fun timewaster to fill the gaps. Look me up in game. IGN: Drafell
reviews.author: Robert Kelford

reviews.title: Tablet
reviews.comment: The new up date is interesting
reviews.author: Tyler Semmel

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: The game had some flaws (such as sometimes the events are heavily weighted to one side) but I have fun playing it and that\'s all I look for in a free game.
reviews.author: Justin Leong

reviews.title: Can\'t download update
reviews.comment: Loading to 11% and than \"insufficient storage space\"

reviews.title: A little complicated... but interesting
reviews.comment: Some aspects of game not explained at all in tutorial... makes a little confusing once your left on ur own to play.

reviews.comment: It has good graphics I like this game

reviews.comment: Can play for only seconds before crash. Nexus 7.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great strategy game that requires time investment in increments so you can\'t overload or burnout.
reviews.author: Carol Good

reviews.comment: Great rts.
reviews.author: Luke Johnson

reviews.title: Was Fun, but now...
reviews.comment: ...the combat system makes the game very unfun at higher levels.  I spend less than two minutes unshielded before I get attacked three times and forced back into a shield.  During that two minutes, I usually only get one or two attacks because of the constant \"this nation has declared peace\" spam.  Its too frustrating to be worth it.
reviews.author: Dave Seaman

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Great gameplay, graphics. Good fun.
reviews.author: Anister Blaze

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Wish having allies was more interactive than bonus resources. Guilds/corporations or something we could pool resources together for. Still an excellent game.
reviews.author: Travis Austin
